ENGLISH.body: Dear {{CUSTOMER_NAME}}, your custom order {{CUSTOM_ORDER_NO}} has been delivered. Thank you for shopping at {{COMPANY_NAME}}. Enjoy your purchase!

Hi {{CUSTOMER_NAME}}, thank you for your purchase {{INVOICE_NO}} with {{COMPANY_NAME}}! You've earned {{REWARD}} as part of our rewards program. Your total rewards balance is now {{TOTAL_REWARDS}}. Use them on your next purchase. Enjoy shopping! For assistance, contact {{CONTACT}}
Hi {{CUSTOMER_NAME}}, your custom order {{CUSTOM_ORDER_NO}} is now being processed. We'll keep you updated at every step. Thank you for choosing {{COMPANY_NAME}}!
Hi {{CUSTOMER_NAME}}, Your order {{CUSTOM_ORDER_NO}} has been successfully completed. Thank you for choosing {{COMPANY_NAME}}!
Hi {{CUSTOMER_NAME}}, your custom order {{CUSTOM_ORDER_NO}} is placed successfully. We'll keep you updated at every step. Thank you for choosing {{COMPANY_NAME}}!
Good news, {{CUSTOMER_NAME}}! Your custom order {{CUSTOM_ORDER_NO}} has been successfully completed. Thank you for shopping with us!
